pref_directory.tooltip:
Choose a directory with files and/or folders in it.
The files will be used to create the menu items.
The folders will be used to create sub-menus.

pref_customtooltip.tooltip: Set a custom tooltip for the applet.

pref_customicon.tooltip: Set a custom icon for the applet.

pref_applet_title.tooltip: Set a custom title for the applet.

pref_hotkey.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu

pref_icon_for_menus.tooltip: Set a custom icon for the applet.

pref_autoupdate.tooltip:
If enabled, every time the menu is opened, the applet will scan the main folder for added/deleted/modified files/folders and rebuild the menu.
If disabled, the menu has to be updated manually from its context menu.

pref_show_only_desktop_files.tooltip:
If enabled, only .desktop files will be used to create the menu.
If disabled, all file types will be used to create the menu.

pref_show_hidden_files.tooltip: If enabled, hidden files will be used to create menu items.

pref_show_hidden_folders.tooltip: If enabled, hidden sub folders will be used to create sub-menus.

pref_show_submenu_icons.tooltip: If disabled, all sub-menu items will be created without icons.

pref_show_applications_icons.tooltip: If disabled, all menu items will be created without icons.

pref_ignore_sub_folders.tooltip: If enabled, the sub folders found inside the main folder will be ignored and sub-menus will not be created.
